pkgmetadata.longdescription: Air Pollution Tolerance Index (APTI) Calculator // It calculates the Air Pollution Tolerance Index (APTI) of plant species using biochemical parameters such as chlorophyll content, leaf extract pH, relative water content, and ascorbic acid content. It helps in identifying tolerant species for greenbelt development and pollution mitigation studies. It includes a 'shiny' app for interactive APTI calculation and visualisation. For method details see, Sahu et al. (2020).DOI:10.1007/s42452-020-3120-6.
